description.value: You change form readily. Once per day, you can use a sorcerer spell slot to cast any common polymorph battle form spell of the spell slot's rank as if it were a signature spell in your repertoire. You can use the extra spell slot from either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Arcane Evolution] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Primal Evolution] instead of a sorcerer spell slot.
